Detailed Description

Helper class for managing constant (key=value) sequences.

Adds to current.

If did not have own copies, creates them now. If was empty, identical to set except that creates copies.

bool wxPGConstants::IsOk (   )  const [inline]
 

Returns false if this is a constant empty set of choices, which should not be modified.

void wxPGConstants::SetId (  size_t  id  ) 
 

If previous id was valid (i.e.

non-zero), then clears it. Then sets this wxPGConstants to new id.
